message: I think it's fair to take the majority of the money, but I want to be sure you feel like you got something out of this deal.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I should get more since the money is worth less to me due to inflation.
I'm willing to compromise. I'm taking a bigger hit from inflation, but I think this is a fair split given the circumstances.
I'm willing to meet you halfway and split the money 50/50. It's not ideal, but I think it's a fair compromise given the circumstances.
